data.message:
Alright shady man I say here FUCK YOU TO. For falling into all the bullshit and travesty you got your fucked up mind into. Here cunt you can proudly lick the fuamunda cheese from under my nuts. 
You can push dasieys with the rest of the lazy bitchminded ass little shits. No thats not a stab to your silly little rainy parade, because we all know your just playing charades for whatever fucker is sucking your dick. It don't matter how sick you can lay down the rhymes when you've just cut your time by way more then a dime. But what did you expect when you've just lost the respect by atleast half of your fan's as were saying you were our man shady. Why whould you forsake us shady? But I guess we all deserve a fate like Stan. Sence your plan is just to say fuck all of U.S. a generation of people who grew up on your music, survived on you music. Thrived to hear the lyrical genious inside you, as we sat back and idolized you. 
Thus it remains to be seen that your still the same punk, to stuck in a trailer park, too afraid to escape the abusive cell were you common and dwell. 
So here I'll challenge you bitch put up your dukes. Fist to fist, face to face child lets see what you got. 
I don't stand alone here saying FUCK YOU TO. 
But I got you hoe, and the bitch ass train that rode your white ass in to.
